column1: Little Goat Diner////We shared the This Little Piggy Went to China and the Crispy Creole Chicken Sammie. This Little Piggy had a very interesting glaze
column2: but the biscuit and sausage were delicious and all the flavors worked very well together. The Creole Sammie was also delicious
column3: but is really just a glorified fried chicken burger. The chicken tasted fresh and the bread was toasted perfectly. The portions for both of our dishes was not big
column4: but not small. You're sort of paying for the name and experience so it's pricey (about $13-20 for most main dishes) but it's not completely unreasonable. We also tried the Little Goat Latte which was good
column5: but a bit too sweet and probably not something I'd order again for $5.
